_description: This configuration uses 100% pure OpenAPI standards. Server overrides are defined directly in JSDoc comments using standard OpenAPI 'servers' field.

_usage.description: Pure OpenAPI server overrides using standard 'servers' field in JSDoc

how_it_works.default_routes: Most routes use default server from serverConfig.json (no override needed)
how_it_works.jsdoc_servers: Override by adding 'servers:' field in @swagger JSDoc comments

default_route.code:
@swagger
/api/users:
  get:
    summary: Get users
    # No servers field = uses serverConfig.json server

override_route.code:
@swagger
/auth/login:
  post:
    servers:
      - url: http://localhost:3000
        description: Auth Server

examples.microservices: Different services on different ports via JSDoc servers
examples.environments: Override production with local development servers in JSDoc

network_files.description: Route files support local paths, absolute paths, or network URLs
